conbody.p: There are several hyperlinks throughout the document to external documents and webpages. I added these by using xrefs. The xrefs points to the external link using a href, the format is html and scope is external. I then add the words that need to be hyperlinked between the opening and closing tag of the xref.
Some links referenced a certain page in a PDF. To get the hyperlink to open at the required page, I added "#page=X" at the end of the link in the href.
